name: ALPHA Volleyball game
description:
PLEASE READ.

WORK IN PROGRESS.  This is a very early build of a volleyball game I'm working on.

1, 2 or 4 player volleyball game. Single player is just  proof of concept. Playing with 2 or 4 is how the game is meant to be played.

CONTROLS:(To be played with controllers)

Read the Controls.txt file in the game folder.

As of now, there is not much in game rules aside from scoring and serve rotation. It's more of a sandbox, so play nicely.

Any and all feedback is appreciated. I want to make this game the best it can be.
